pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a small project of mine demonstrating a single-core CPU rendering of a 3D space. It utilizes a C file to define objects like spheres and polygons. User can move around using keyboard to see how the world looks like from different points of view and angles. Also there is a possibility to change focal length and even make it negative. Please be aware that this program is a toy and it is not meant to be used for purposes other than educational or just for fun.
